alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cumberland; Coastal Waldo; Coastal York; Knox; Lincoln; Sagadahoc (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued November 26 at 4:53PM EST until November 27 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO NOON EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Strong southeast flow ahead of low pressure tracking north through the area will combine with high astronomical tides to produce splashover and beach erosion, as well a s few areas of minor coastal flooding Monday morning. * WHERE...In Maine, Coastal York, Coastal Cumberland, Sagadahoc, Lincoln, Knox and Coastal Waldo Counties. In New Hampshire, Coastal Rockingham County. * WHEN...From 8 AM to noon EST Monday. * IMPACTS...A few roads may be closed with up to 1 foot of inundation expected in more vulnerable areas. Splashover and some beach erosion is likely. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
